timeline.message: Skip download javadoc and sources automatically in IntelliJ IDEA.

timeline.bodyText: requireNonNull shouldn't be used with return statements, it's really for validating parameters. I understand it's to replace the usage of @lombok.NonNull but I think we can just delete it here, especially since they're all private methods. Best would be for us to consistently add @Nullable and enable NullAway (not for this PR).
timeline.author: anuraaga

timeline.bodyText: This is ok, though also rare to validate parameters for a private method.
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: I'll remove it, if dig into public methods which use this variable, they already have Objects.requireNonNull validation.
replies.author: donbeave

timeline.author: anuraaga
